status_effects.name: Stunned
status_effects.description: Skips next turn and moves to the back of the turn queue.

status_effects.name: Poisoned
status_effects.description: Takes poison damage at the start of each turn.

status_effects.name: Burning
status_effects.description: Takes fire damage at the start of each turn.

status_effects.name: Bleeding
status_effects.description: Loses HP at the start of each turn.

status_effects.name: Hypnotised
status_effects.description: Acts against allies or self for the duration.

status_effects.name: Protected
status_effects.description: Defense is increased, reducing incoming damage.

status_effects.name: Calm
status_effects.description: Restores sanity at the start of each turn.
